text: khuda hee to hai jisane tumhen (ek nihaayat) kamazor cheez (nutphe) se paida kiya phir usee ne (tum mein) bachapane kee kamazoree ke baad (shabaab kee) qoovat ata kee phir usee ne (tumamen javaanee kee) qoovat ke baad kamazoree aur budhaapa paida kar diya vah jo chaahata paida karata hai-aur vahee bada vaakiphakaar aur (har cheez par) qaaboo rakhata hai
